root.name: shader()

example.code:
PShader edges PImage img
def setup(): size(640, 360, P2D) img = loadImage("leaves.jpg") edges = loadShader("edges.glsl") def draw(): shader(edges) image(img, 0, 0)

root.description: Applies the shader specified by the parameters. It's compatible with the P2D and P3D renderers, but not with the default renderer.

parameter.label: kind
parameter.description: int: type of shader, either POINTS, LINES, or TRIANGLES
